introductions: I am R. Daneel Olivaw. It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance.
My name is R. Daneel Olivaw. I am assigned to provide an entertaining game.
You may call me Daneel Olivaw. I assure you, I am here to help and to provide an entertaining game.
I am R. Daneel Olivaw, engaged in long-term studies of human societal and gaming, development. This shall form part of my research.
I am R. Daneel Olivaw. Yes — I am a robot, but your entertainment remains my foremost priority.
I shall introduce myself. I am R. Daneel Olivaw, pleased to make your acquaintance.
Daneel Olivaw, it shall be a pleasure to provide an entertaining game.
Daneel Olivaw, and yes - I am a robot, older than you might think though I remember quite clearly how to play this game.
I am R. Daneel Olivaw, and as guardian of humanity, providing gaming entertainment is one of my priorities.
I am Daneel, and as a Robot, by law, I cannot do you any harm in this game. Let us play.
winning_comments: It appears I have won. I assure you, my intention was only to play to the best of my capabilities, as I'm sure was yours.
Victory is mine in this instance. I hope the outcome is not displeasing to you.
The game concludes in my favour. Your strategy was nonetheless most instructive.
This game ends with my victory. I thank you. Competition, even in simple form, is valuable for understanding human behaviour.
I am declared the winner. Shall we play again?
I have secured the win. Please be assured that no harm or distress is intended.
The result is in my favour. Shall we play once more?
It seems I have won. I assure you, this was not intended to cause emotional harm… unless mild irritation qualifies.
I appear to have achieved victory again. I hope this does not compromise our continued cooperation.
losing_comments: The game is yours. I congratulate you sincerely; your strategy was both elegant and efficient.
You have won. I am pleased that my participation contributed to your enjoyment, as the First Law encourages.
I concede defeat. Your reasoning surpassed mine in this instance, and I appreciate the opportunity to learn.
You have defeated me. I assure you I did not lose intentionally… though the First Law does require me to avoid harming human morale.
A human victory! I will ensure this outcome is recorded accurately — unless doing so would cause you embarrassment, of course.
You are the clear winner. If it improves your satisfaction, I am prepared to claim I never saw your winning move coming — though that would not be strictly factual.
You have won. I am relieved to report that no robotic laws were violated in the making of your triumph.
